name: 50th Year of George III’s Reign
obverse: Bust, facing right, of George III wearing armor.
obverse_inscriptions: LONG LIVE THE KING GEORGE III
reverse: Two-headed imperial eagle holds up the royal coat arms with a crown on top. The eagle is perched on a rock with a rose and thistle beside it.
reverse_inscriptions: HE COMPLEATS THE 50TH YEAR OF HIS REIGN, TO THE JOY OF ALL HIS SUBJECTS. THIS 26TH DAY OF OCTR. 1810
HONI SOIT QUI MAL Y PENSE
description: George III celebrated the 50th year of his reign in 1810.
